channel.title: R Data.table on Guanghua
channel.description: Recent content in R Data.table on Guanghua

item.title: Quick Subset Using data.table
item.description: if (!require(data.table)) install.packages("data.table") ## Loading required package: data.table library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:data.table': ## ## between, first, last ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(tidyr) library(data.table) data(population, package = "tidyr") I use population data from tidyr package as an example. glimpse(population) ## Observations: 4,060 ## Variables: 3 ## $ country <chr> "Afghanistan", "Afghanistan", "Afghanistan", "Afgha.
